headline: UBS downgrades Gartner after large Q2 miss, slashes price target
summary: Investing.com --UBS downgraded Gartner (NYSE:IT) Inc to Neutral from Buy and cut its price target sharply to $270 from $480, citing a significant miss in second-quarter contract value (CV) growth and a reset in expectations for 2025 and 2026.

headline: Cohere Health Recognized in 2025 Gartner® Hype Cycle™ for U.S. Healthcare Payers
summary: Cohere Health®, the leader in clinical intelligence solutions for health plans, today announced that it has been included for a fourth consecutive year in the Gartner Hype Cycle for U.S. Healthcare Payers, 2025 (June 2025) in the Intelligent Prior Authorization (iPA) category. The category received a "Transformational" Benefit Rating, with Gartner citing iPA's impact to "improve clinical and financial outcomes significantly by transforming one of healthcare's most manual processes."
